q: Can I ask my own questions?
a: Yes! The second half of every Seminar is for open Q & A like office hours. You can ask questions or even bring your code that doesn't compile. Participants will be invited on-screen to share their work and their questions. You may also join us between Seminars on Element.

q: I am not a [Substrate] developer, can I still participate?
a: Yes! The second half of every Seminar is for open Q & A like office hours. You can ask questions or even bring your code that doesn't compile. Participants will be invited on-screen to share their work and their questions. You may also join us between Seminars on Element.

Seminar has changed formats a few times so the recordings are in a few places:

  • 23 June 2020 and later are on Crowdcast.
  • 19 November 2019 - 23 June 2020 are on the Substrate Seminar YouTube playlist.
  • 03 June 2019 - 02 November 2019 are on the Substrate Collaborative Learning YouTube playlist.
